Subskills.name: Endochondral Ossification
Subskills.description: Increases the amount of bone shreds.

Subskills.name: LRP5 Gene
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by bone shred.

Subskills.name: Bomb of Bones
Subskills.description: Throw a bonebomb that explodes into an increased amount of bone shred into all directions.

Subskills.name: Remodelling
Subskills.description: Decreases mana cost when using bone shred.

Subskills.name: Bone Disruption
Subskills.description: Increases projectile speed of the bone shreds.

Subskills.name: Osteochondroma
Subskills.description: Chance on cast to increase the damage and size of bones.

Subskills.name: Quick Growth
Subskills.description: Increases cast rate when using bone shred.

Subskills.name: Bonerang
Subskills.description: Bone shreds now return to the necromancer dealing increased damage.

Subskills.name: Skeletal Split
Subskills.description: Bone shreds split into multiple piercing shreds on hit.

Subskills.name: Exposed Fracture
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict bleeding on hit.

Subskills.name: Infected Wound
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to bleeding targets.

Subskills.name: Bone Spurs
Subskills.description: Chance on cast to unleash additional bone shreds.

Subskills.name: Shattering Carcass
Subskills.description: Bone shreds now explode into piercing bone shards on hit.

Subskills.name: Orbiting Remains
Subskills.description: Bone shred now orbits the necromancer with increased damage and are sent outwards after a short period if they do not hit a target.
